channel.title: Minnesota AG Press Releases
channel.description: Latest press releases from the Minnesota Attorney General's Office

item.title: Attorney General Ellison wins court order restoring critical education funds to states
item.description:
Publication Date: May 06, 2025

Court orders Trump administration to immediately restore access to over $1 billion nationally in funds that help schools, teachers, and vulnerable students recover from COVID-19

https://www.ag.state.mn.us/Office/Communications/2025/05/06_EducationFunds.asp

item.title: Attorney General Ellison wins court order protecting federal agencies supporting libraries, museums, minority-owned businesses, and workers
